results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 2a13f3981d314941a42036beb7f643c1. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types must be supported, and regression tests must pass.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 2846852491d646cbbb9f8856a09b0b41:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
